remarks: Ordered pair membership in a restriction when the first member belongs to the restricting class.  (Contributed by NM, 30-Apr-2004.)  (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 27-Aug-2011.)
statement:
opres.1 $e |- B e. _V $.
opres $p |- ( A e. D -> ( <. A , B >. e. ( C |` D ) <-> <. A , B >. e. C ) ) $.
